data.message: Eminem didn't have to do any of this and I agrees with people he does more then most of you know and yes he did work hard for his money. God says love thy naibor. This is a way to do so and help the less fortunate you don't have to buy everything anything helps speaking as a mom of three and in collage having to buy me and my kids school supplies I know how it feels. And for the people that say oh the hard working people don't get help so why should you because you can be better then the last a××hole.
